Name: 2D Platformer GAME (Toy Factory)
About the game: It is a 2D adventure game with cute characters. The stage is a mini-game with a total of 7 stages. There are videos at the opening and ending. The atmosphere is mysterious, cute, and hand-drawn. ------------ Summary of the story. The mother's soul, who died in the accident, was reborn as a defective doll in a doll factory. The defective doll with the mother's soul is about to return to her daughter. Please help her get to her daughter safely. Please help me to get her home safely.
